column1: Geospatial Sciences (Geographic Information Science and Computing) MSc
column3: Department of Civil, Environmental & Geomatic Engineering
column5: Register your interest in study at UCLThe Geospatial Sciences (GIS and Computing) MSc teaches students the theory, tools and techniques for working with geospatial data, from acquisition to processing to analysis. Students have the opportunity to engage and work with academics and industrial partners on cutting-edge research through seminars and a dissertation.
column7: Register your interest in study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
